title: Texture atlas mappings
description: Patches and other mappings for TextureAtlas.js.

blocks_dot_json_patches.description: Block names that need to be remapped to something else in blocks.json.

blocks_to_use_carried_textures.description: An array of block names that should use their carried textures.

transparent_blocks.description: Blocks that are transparent and need a certain opacity applied to them.

terrain_texture_patches.description: Terrain texture keys that should lead to a specified texture path, instead of what's in terrain_texture.json.

terrain_texture_tints.description: Terrain texture keys that should have their textures tinted.

terrain_texture_keys.description: The actual terrain texture keys that should have tints applied.

oneOf.description: A tint colour and a flag to make it be tinted like a PNG image.

tint_like_png.description: If true, the image will be tinted as if it were a PNG image, despite being a TGA image. (TGA images are tinted different to PNG images.)

missing_flipbook_textures.description: File paths of flipbook textures that aren't used in-game because they're missing from flipbook_textures.json. This fixes up their UV coordinates.

oneOf.description: A tint colour, as defined in the "colors" property.
